channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: President-Elect Lai Ching-te Visits Taichung Base, Praises Air Force Personnel
item.description: President-elect Lai Ching-te has visited an air base in Taichung where he praised the personnel for their defense of the country's airspace.

item.title: Military Holds Anti-Landing Drill on East Coast Beach
item.description: Soldiers practice repelling a Chinese invasion at one possible landing site in Taitung on Taiwan's east coast.

item.title: Gov't Announces US$90M Earthquake Relief Plan for Hualien
item.description: The government has announced a relief package for quake-hit Hualien worth over US$90 million to help displaced people and bail out the local tourism sector.

item.title: Legislators Say Taiwan Still Creating Too Much Plastic Waste
item.description: Despite efforts to cut down on single-use plastics, lawmakers in Taiwan say not enough is being done to achieve the governmentâ€™s plan for a total ban on single-use plastic straws,
